title: Physio Cell & Mol  Syst
description: In depth cell and molecular physiology focused on cellular responses to stimuli, including cell organization/ reorganization, membrane transport/kinetics, cell signaling/ molecular biology, mechanobiology and energy requirements.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 3100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
